DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety use AnapnoGuard 100 system course mechanical ventilation intubation critical care patient Intensive Care Unit .
DOC.criteria: Age 21 ( men woman ) ; Patient admit ICU expect receive mechanical ventilation 12 hour Absence clear sign pneumonia lung contusion chest X ray ; For study patient , connection ETT AnapnoGuard system less 6 hour intubation initiation ; No fever fever know non chest/lung origin ; Patients treat mechanical ventilation last 3 month ; Patients facial , oropharyngeal neck trauma BMI > 40 Pregnant woman Patients ventilate prone position Difficult intubation ( defined 3 intubation attempt )
